qas.question: What is the prognosis for asthma?
What has caused the mortality rate to decrease?

answers.text: due to better recognition and improvement in care

qas.question: Worldwide, how many people suffer from asthma?
How many cases that are diagnosed in childhood make it past 10 years with asthma?

answers.text: half of cases will no longer carry the diagnosis after a decade

qas.question: What is the prognosis after treating airway remodeling?

plausible_answers.text: due to better recognition and improvement in care

qas.question: Why has airway remodeling decreased in children over the last few decades?
How many people will no longer be diagnosed with decline in lung function after 2004?
Is treatment with corticosteroids harmful or beneficial?
What is used to treat airway remodeling?
